abstract: — In today’s New York Times, Bill Carter previews the Fox Business Network: “In a pep talk to his troops Friday afternoon, Roger Ailes, the chairman of both networks, said, ‘I’m not interested in anything short of a revolution.'”
lead_paragraph: — In today’s New York Times, Bill Carter previews the Fox Business Network: “In a pep talk to his troops Friday afternoon, Roger Ailes, the chairman of both networks, said, ‘I’m not interested in anything short of a revolution.'”

headline.main: Clips: Fox Business, ‘Gossip Girl,’ TiVo Trends, Tempo
